items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript widget for integrating Atai chatbot into any website using an iframe. This script creates a floating chatbot button that toggles a chatbot window, ensuring seamless embedding and a smooth user experience.

items.content_html: A complete setup for building a cross-platform desktop application using React (frontend), Vite (development tooling), Node.js (backend), and Electron (desktop environment). This project serves as a template for developers looking to build modern desktop applications with a lightweight backend.

This project serves as a template for developers looking to build modern desktop applications with a lightweight backend.
